import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MatIconModule } from '@angular/material/icon'; import { MatButtonModule } from '@angular/material/button'; import { MatToolbarModule } from '@angular/material/toolbar'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'], }) export class HeaderComponent {}
